statements.select: select Initials, EmployeeNumber, LicenseNumber, Birthday, EnlistmentDate, TerminationDate, HasApplicationAccess, LoginName from Resources.CrewMembers p inner join [System].ItemsQuery i on i.Id=p.Id left join Contacts.Addresses a on a.Id=p.AddressId left join [System].Items i2 on i2.Id=p.DepartmentId left join [System].Items i3 on i3.Id=p.MemberFunctionId left join Resources.MemberFunctions mf on mf.Id=p.MemberFunctionId order by p.Initials
